a.description: Coefficient tensor, of shape b.shape + Q. Q, a tuple, equals the shape of that sub-tensor of a consisting of the appropriate number of its rightmost indices, and must be such that prod(Q) == prod(b.shape) (in which sense a is said to be ‘square’).

b.description: Right-hand tensor, which can be of any shape.

axes.description: Axes in a to reorder to the right, before inversion. If None (default), no reordering is done.
